body.name: Tommee Tippee Closer to Nature 3 in 1 Convertible Glass Baby Bottles, Anti-Colic Valve – 9-ounce, 3 Count
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 9 hrs 42 mins
features: 100% pure glass baby bottle featuring our award-winning breast-like nipple, with adaptable design that lasts as your baby grows
BREAST-LIKE NIPPLE, ANTI-COLIC VALVE: Smooth silicone bottle nipple flexes like mom for an easy latch and seamless breast to bottle transition, acceptance guaranteed*
BABY-SAFE: Medical-grade borosilicate glass is free of BPA, BPS, phthalates and toxins
GROWS WITH BABY: Convertible design for use as a baby bottle, food jar, or open cup
DURABLE: Thermal shock-resistant glass for long-lasting and continual use, and superior stain-resistance leaves no odors or white film
body.description: The award-winning Closer to Nature baby bottle makes switching between breast and bottle feeding simpler than ever. With guaranteed acceptance* and a built-in anti-colic valve, it could just be the best thing for baby, since you! Now, we’ve combined our breast-like nipple and contoured bottle design with premium 100% medical-grade glass. Inspired by mom, designed by experts. The 3 in 1 design ensures continued use through the precious stages of baby’s life, from baby bottle to food jar and open cup. Helping you Parent On. *Acceptance guaranteed: 92% of more than 1200 parents who used our nipple with their child recalled that they accepted it within the first 3 attempts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Naturally sustainable and long-lasting. 100% recyclable, baby safe glass bottle base. Durable medical grade glass, that is naturally stain resistant and free from BPA, phthalates and toxins. Natural latch. Our bottle nipples are made from soft silicone and have a special breast-like shape that encourages a natural latch and prevents nipple confusion when switching between bottle and breast. Natural pace.

Most recommended baby bottle. Our Closer to Nature Anti-Colic bottles are voted #1 for easily switching between bottle and breast*. Anti-colic. The Closer to Nature nipple with anti-colic valve reduces excessive air flow, so little ones ingest more milk and less air, preventing symptoms of colic. Easy clean and BPA free. These bottles are suitable for use in the dishwasher, microwave and sterilizers. All Tommee Tippee bottles are BPA- and phthalate-free for your ultimate reassurance.

Go with the flow. We offer different flow rates to keep up with your growing baby. Every baby is different but as a guide we suggest slow flow and vari flow for 0+months, medium flow for 3+ months and fast flow for 6+ months. Change me. Our nipples are silky soft. Change them if they get damaged or bitten by tiny teeth. Closer to Nature baby bottles are ONLY compatible with Closer to Nature nipples and cannot be used with advanced anti-colic bottle nipples. Squeeze me. When assembling your baby bottle, hold the nipple up to the light to check the slit in the silicone isn’t sealed closed. If it has, pinch it gently between your fingers or with nipple tongs to re-open. If the valve has sealed closed, your bottle won’t vent properly.

Closer to Nature Closer to Nature Glass Closer to Nature Silicone Advanced Anti-Colic Bottle material: Plastic Borosilicate glass Silicone Plastic Breast-like teat for a natural latch ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Teat flexes like mum for a comfortable feed ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Anti-colic valve in teat ✓ ✓ ✓ Unique anti-colic straw draws air away from milk ✓ Sizes available: 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce, 11 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce 5 Ounce, 9 Ounce Replacement teats available: Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Extra Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Extra Cereal Flow Extra Slow Flow, Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow, Extra Cereal Flow Slow Flow, Medium Flow, Fast Flow BPA Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We’ve been using these for 9 months and never had any issues, they are great! I love the glass, it’s easy to get it clean without any lingering smells. I don’t have to worry about weird chemicals leeching out or the bottle getting too hot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had been on the hunt for a glass bottle for my little one and I’m so happy I found these! For the price, they’re amazing! So easy to travel with, love how thick and durable the glass is; and I love that you can also use them to store purées in as well. Such a great two in one bottle! They have quickly become my babies favorite bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy to have found that this brand makes glass bottles. They’re perfect. They are slightly larger than the plastic ones. They clean very easily and have worked well for my son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love these glass bottles
reviews.reviewText: Ever since finding out we were expecting we knew we didn't want to use plastic and set out in search of glass bottles that we can use from day one up till cereal is added. With my step daughter they used tommee tippee and my aunt used them with both of her boys and absolutely loved them. I've not gotten a chance to use these specific bottles as my little one has not arrived yet, but I'm very impressed with the product and the interchangeable nipples to get the correct flow for your little one. I've read a lot of other great reviews on this product and I'm super excited to use them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No nipple confusion after week of exclusive bottle feeding!
reviews.reviewText: From weeks 4 to 5 of my baby's life I pumped and bottle fed almost exclusively. Yesterday I put him back to breast - there was a brief learning curve for me as I needed to get him to latch more deeply to avoid him gumming down on my nipple, but after only 12 hours he is comfortably back at breast and doing great. He does clearly work a little harder at breast, but he latches well and accepts it readily. It's nice to know I can transition between bottle and breast without any issues thanks to these bottles!These bottles are very easy to clean. I love that they are glass - avoids more plastic garbage and I believe is healthier for less exposure to plastics overall. And I love that they have a multi-stage use, so even when my baby is bigger I won't have a bunch of old bottles sitting around. I do wish they made the smaller size in glass as well, but the full size isn't bad because the length allows me to do some one-handed feeds.Would buy again - and I have, I purchased a few sets of these since we needed several to get through the week of only bottle feeding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No anticolic valve
reviews.reviewText: We love these for storing milk but my boy doesn’t quite like them yet due to how fast the milk comes down. He’s used to Dr browns bottle with the anti colic valve in the middle so he doesn’t like these but I use them often still. We prefer class over plastic so we bought glass Dr browns and he prefers those. Still recommend these though. Oh also SUPER STURDY… I’ve dropped these multiple times while doing too many things at once and they were fine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Breastfed baby uses them so well. No issues transitioning from being EBF when I went back to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just what I wanted for reasonable price
reviews.reviewText: Note these come with three slow-flow nipples. Buy medium or high flow nipples separately for older baby

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect bottle and perfect nipple for the babies
reviews.reviewText: This brand bottle is the perfect feeding bottle. I tried all kind of feeding bottles for my son but none of those worked then i saw tommee tippee bottle at Walmart store i took it and my son liked it but it was plastic bottle and i couldn't find tommee tippee glass bottle in nearby stores. So finally I find it here. I don't prefer plastic bottle because after every feeding i need to boil it and it look very old after couple of times boiling. The nipple of this bottle is perfect for babies

Amo este producto , lamentablemente ya no está en stock y justo que iba volver a comprarlo sus biberones en plástico son bueno pero sin duda prefiero los de vidrio que mal que solo estén en su mayoría disponible para Europa y no para los demás países
Received on time, comes with 3 glass bottles and lids,Bottle are marked as made in china.
Better than phillips and less part to wash than Dr.brown. i loved them and my baby too
Love the closer to nature style and the glass bottles are light weight and good size. Quality is awesome
